trans-unit.source: Stream Analytics Release Notes | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Stream Analytics Release Notes | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Stream Analytics GA Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Stream Analytics GA Release Notes

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Stream Analytic release notes
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Stream Analytic release notes

trans-unit.source: Notes for 08/20/2015 release of Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Notes for 08/20/2015 release of Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: This release contains the following updates.
trans-unit.target: This release contains the following updates.

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Added LAST function
trans-unit.target: Added LAST function

trans-unit.source: The [LAST](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt421186.aspx) function is now available in Stream Analytics jobs, enabling you to retrieve the most recent event in an event stream within a given timeframe.
trans-unit.target: The [LAST](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt421186.aspx) function is now available in Stream Analytics jobs, enabling you to retrieve the most recent event in an event stream within a given timeframe.

trans-unit.source: New Array functions
trans-unit.target: New Array functions

trans-unit.source: Array functions [GetArrayElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270218.aspx), [GetArrayElements](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt298451.aspx) and [GetArrayLength](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270226.aspx) are now available.
trans-unit.target: Array functions [GetArrayElement](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270218.aspx), [GetArrayElements](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt298451.aspx) and [GetArrayLength](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270226.aspx) are now available.

trans-unit.source: New Record functions
trans-unit.target: New Record functions

trans-unit.source: Record functions [GetRecordProperties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270221.aspx) and [GetRecordPropertyValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270220.aspx) are now available.
trans-unit.target: Record functions [GetRecordProperties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270221.aspx) and [GetRecordPropertyValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt270220.aspx) are now available.

trans-unit.source: Notes for 07/30/2015 release of Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Notes for 07/30/2015 release of Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: This release contains the following updates.
trans-unit.target: This release contains the following updates.

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Power BI Org Id decoupled from Azure Id
trans-unit.target: Power BI Org Id decoupled from Azure Id

trans-unit.source: This feature enables [Power BI output](stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard.md) for ASA jobs under any Azure account type (Live Id or Org Id).
trans-unit.target: This feature enables [Power BI output](stream-analytics-power-bi-dashboard.md) for ASA jobs under any Azure account type (Live Id or Org Id).

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can have one Org Id for your Azure account and use a different one for authorizing Power BI output.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you can have one Org Id for your Azure account and use a different one for authorizing Power BI output.

trans-unit.source: Support for Service Bus Queues output
trans-unit.target: Support for Service Bus Queues output

trans-unit.source: [Service Bus Queues](stream-analytics-connect-data-event-outputs.md#service-bus-queues) outputs are now available in Stream Analytics jobs.
trans-unit.target: [Service Bus Queues](stream-analytics-connect-data-event-outputs.md#service-bus-queues) outputs are now available in Stream Analytics jobs.

trans-unit.source: Support for Service Bus Topics output
trans-unit.target: Support for Service Bus Topics output

trans-unit.source: [Service Bus Topics](stream-analytics-connect-data-event-outputs.md#service-bus-topics) outputs are now available in Stream Analytics jobs.
trans-unit.target: [Service Bus Topics](stream-analytics-connect-data-event-outputs.md#service-bus-topics) outputs are now available in Stream Analytics jobs.

trans-unit.source: Notes for 07/09/2015 release of Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Notes for 07/09/2015 release of Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: This release contains the following updates.
trans-unit.target: This release contains the following updates.

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Custom Blob Output Partitioning
trans-unit.target: Custom Blob Output Partitioning

trans-unit.source: Blob storage outputs now allow an option to specify the frequency that output blobs are written and the structure and format of the output data path folder structure.
trans-unit.target: Blob storage outputs now allow an option to specify the frequency that output blobs are written and the structure and format of the output data path folder structure.

trans-unit.source: Notes for 05/03/2015 release of Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Notes for 05/03/2015 release of Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: This release contains the following updates.
trans-unit.target: This release contains the following updates.

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Increased maximum value for Out of Order Tolerance Window
trans-unit.target: Increased maximum value for Out of Order Tolerance Window

trans-unit.source: The maximum size for the Out of Order Tolerance Window is now 59:59 (MM:SS)
trans-unit.target: The maximum size for the Out of Order Tolerance Window is now 59:59 (MM:SS)

trans-unit.source: JSON Output Format: Line Separated or Array
trans-unit.target: JSON Output Format: Line Separated or Array

trans-unit.source: Now there is an option when outputting to Blob Storage or Event Hub to output as either an array of JSON objects or by separating JSON objects with a new line.
trans-unit.target: Now there is an option when outputting to Blob Storage or Event Hub to output as either an array of JSON objects or by separating JSON objects with a new line.

trans-unit.source: Notes for 04/16/2015 release of Stream Analytics
trans-unit.target: Notes for 04/16/2015 release of Stream Analytics

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Delay in Azure Storage account configuration
trans-unit.target: Delay in Azure Storage account configuration

trans-unit.source: When creating a Stream Analytics job in a region for the first time, you will be prompted to create a new Storage account or specify an existing account for monitoring Stream Analytics jobs in that region.
trans-unit.target: When creating a Stream Analytics job in a region for the first time, you will be prompted to create a new Storage account or specify an existing account for monitoring Stream Analytics jobs in that region.

trans-unit.source: Due to latency in configuring monitoring, creating another Stream Analytics job in the same region within 30 minutes will prompt for the specifying of a second Storage account instead of showing the recently configured one in the Monitoring Storage Account drop-down.
trans-unit.target: Due to latency in configuring monitoring, creating another Stream Analytics job in the same region within 30 minutes will prompt for the specifying of a second Storage account instead of showing the recently configured one in the Monitoring Storage Account drop-down.

trans-unit.source: To avoid creating an unnecessary Storage account, wait 30 minutes after creating a job in a region for the first time before provisioning additional jobs in that region.
trans-unit.target: To avoid creating an unnecessary Storage account, wait 30 minutes after creating a job in a region for the first time before provisioning additional jobs in that region.

trans-unit.source: Job Upgrade
trans-unit.target: Job Upgrade

trans-unit.source: At this time, Stream Analytics does not support live edits to the definition or configuration of a running job.
trans-unit.target: At this time, Stream Analytics does not support live edits to the definition or configuration of a running job.

trans-unit.source: In order to change the input, output, query, scale or configuration of a running job, you must first stop the job.
trans-unit.target: In order to change the input, output, query, scale or configuration of a running job, you must first stop the job.

trans-unit.source: Data types inferred from input source
trans-unit.target: Data types inferred from input source

trans-unit.source: If a CREATE TABLE statement is not used, the input type is derived from input format, for example all fields from CSV are string.
trans-unit.target: If a CREATE TABLE statement is not used, the input type is derived from input format, for example all fields from CSV are string.

trans-unit.source: Fields need to be converted explicitly to the right type using the CAST function in order to avoid type mismatch errors.
trans-unit.target: Fields need to be converted explicitly to the right type using the CAST function in order to avoid type mismatch errors.

trans-unit.source: Missing fields are outputted as null values
trans-unit.target: Missing fields are outputted as null values

trans-unit.source: Referencing a field that is not present in the input source will result in null values in the output event.
trans-unit.target: Referencing a field that is not present in the input source will result in null values in the output event.

trans-unit.source: WITH statements must precede SELECT statements
trans-unit.target: WITH statements must precede SELECT statements

trans-unit.source: In your query, SELECT statements must follow subqueries defined in WITH statements.
trans-unit.target: In your query, SELECT statements must follow subqueries defined in WITH statements.

trans-unit.source: Out-of-memory issue
trans-unit.target: Out-of-memory issue

trans-unit.source: Streaming Analytics jobs with a large tolerance for out-of-order events and/or complex queries maintaining a large amount of state may cause the job to run out of memory, resulting in a job restart.
trans-unit.target: Streaming Analytics jobs with a large tolerance for out-of-order events and/or complex queries maintaining a large amount of state may cause the job to run out of memory, resulting in a job restart.

trans-unit.source: The start and stop operations will be visible in the job’s operation logs.
trans-unit.target: The start and stop operations will be visible in the job’s operation logs.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this behavior, scale the query out across multiple partitions.
trans-unit.target: To avoid this behavior, scale the query out across multiple partitions.

trans-unit.source: In a future release, this limitation will be addressed by degrading performance on impacted jobs instead of restarting them.
trans-unit.target: In a future release, this limitation will be addressed by degrading performance on impacted jobs instead of restarting them.

trans-unit.source: Large blob inputs without payload timestamp may cause Out-of-memory issue
trans-unit.target: Large blob inputs without payload timestamp may cause Out-of-memory issue

trans-unit.source: Consuming large files from Blob storage may cause Stream Analytics jobs to crash if a timestamp field is not specified via TIMESTAMP BY.
trans-unit.target: Consuming large files from Blob storage may cause Stream Analytics jobs to crash if a timestamp field is not specified via TIMESTAMP BY.

trans-unit.source: To avoid this issue, keep each blob under 10MB in size.
trans-unit.target: To avoid this issue, keep each blob under 10MB in size.

trans-unit.source: SQL Database event volume limitation
trans-unit.target: SQL Database event volume limitation

trans-unit.source: When using SQL Database as an output target, very high volumes of output data may cause the Stream Analytics job to time out.
trans-unit.target: When using SQL Database as an output target, very high volumes of output data may cause the Stream Analytics job to time out.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this issue, either reduce the output volume by using aggregates or filter operators, or choose Azure Blob storage or Event Hubs as an output target instead.
trans-unit.target: To resolve this issue, either reduce the output volume by using aggregates or filter operators, or choose Azure Blob storage or Event Hubs as an output target instead.

trans-unit.source: PowerBI datasets can only contain one table
trans-unit.target: PowerBI datasets can only contain one table

trans-unit.source: PowerBI does not support more than one table in a given dataset.
trans-unit.target: PowerBI does not support more than one table in a given dataset.

trans-unit.source: Get help
trans-unit.target: Get help

trans-unit.source: For further assistance, try our [Azure Stream Analytics forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/home?forum=AzureStreamAnalytics)
trans-unit.target: For further assistance, try our [Azure Stream Analytics forum](https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/home?forum=AzureStreamAnalytics)
